resources.string:
Expense Manager Features: 

 Expense : Create, View and Delete the Expense. Create your expenses corresponding to specific category and account used for the transaction. 

 Category : Create, View and Delete simply the category name (like: Food, Transport, Grocery etc). 

 Account : Create, View and Delete Account. Account will include Account Name (you want to set the name), Account Type (like: saving account, current account, paytm etc) and Account Description. 

 Category Filter : Filter the expenses data for viewing. Select the categories to show expenses only of those categories. If not selected any of them then all category expenses will be automatically selected.


 Account Filter : Filter the expense with respect to accounts. Select the accounts whose expense you want to show. If not selected any then all expenses will be selected by default.



 Note : 
1. Expense or Category or Accounts (any text field) will accept only alphabets or numeric keys. 
2. Special characters or other symbols in text fields will be notified with error and not accepted. 
3. If category or account is deleted, the corresponding expense will not be deleted and the account will remain same for it. 
4. Minimum Android 4.0 version support for the app. Material design is included and will work on supported platforms.
